mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.room_name AS "roomName", a.head_image_url AS "headImageUrl", a.room_code AS "roomCode", a.image_url AS "imageUrl", a.type AS "type", a.status AS "status", a.payment AS "payment", a.city AS "city", a.video_url AS "videoUrl", a.module_id AS "moduleId", a.created AS "created", a.module_code AS "moduleCode", a.module_name AS "moduleName"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tc_room( id, room_name, head_image_url, room_code, image_url, type, status, payment, city, video_url, module_id, created, module_code, module_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{roomName}, #{headImageUrl}, #{roomCode}, #{imageUrl}, #{type}, #{status}, #{payment}, #{city}, #{videoUrl}, #{moduleId}, #{created}, #{moduleCode}, #{moduleName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tc_room SET room_name = #{roomName}, head_image_url = #{headImageUrl}, room_code = #{roomCode}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, payment = #{payment}, city = #{city}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, module_id = #{moduleId}, created = #{created}, module_code = #{moduleCode}, module_name = #{moduleName} WHERE id = #{id}
